text: William Edward Bell (June 10, 1891 – June 3, 1952) was a Canadian professional ice hockey centre who played four seasons in the National Hockey Association and six in the National Hockey League for the Montreal Wanderers, Montreal Canadiens and Ottawa Senators. He won the Stanley Cup in 1924 with the Canadiens. ==Career statistics== Regular season Playoffs Season Team League GP G A Pts PIM GP G A Pts PIM 1917–18 Montreal Wanderers NHL 2 1 0 1 0 1917–18 Montreal Canadiens NHL 6 0 0 0 3 1918–19 Montreal Canadiens NHL 1 0 0 0 0 1920–21 Montreal Canadiens NHL 4 0 0 0 0 1921–22 Montreal Canadiens NHL 6 1 0 1 0 1921–22 Ottawa Senators NHL 17 1 1 2 4 1922–23 Montreal Canadiens NHL 15 0 0 0 0 1923–24 Montreal Canadiens NHL 10 0 0 0 0 NHL totals 61 3 1 4 7 ==Other websites== * Category:1891 births Category:1959 deaths Category:Ice hockey people from Quebec Category:Montreal Canadiens players Category:Montreal Wanderers players Category:Ottawa Senators (original) players Category:Stanley Cup champions Category:Canadian ice hockey centres
title: Billy Bell
